title: New Client
body:
For some reason whenever i update to the new client and click launch nothing ever comes up it just crashes without a reason. I do not know why it does this at all, and due to the legacy client retiring I guess i can't really play league. Pls help if you can.

Here is a video showing what happens-https://youtu.be/dyMKVoSgH_g

replies.body: Thanks for the video!  This can happen when a security setting is blocking the client from opening up.  The steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should help reconfigure some settings and get in.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Yeah I have the same problem, if I try launching from the league of legends launcher though it just says it isn't a valid win32 applicaiton you have this too?
https://youtu.be/dyMKVoSgH_g just made a video on it this is what happens to me
